content: I like the idea of categorizing by trip, and I think I'll use some of those smaller boxes within a larger container to separate items further. I also like the idea of a shadow box or display case for some of my more fragile items. By the way, speaking of fragile items, I've been meaning to find a hammer and some nails to hang up the framed pictures I bought from our Paris trip, do you have any tips on how to do that?
